value.name: Prince William 'loathed' Princess Diana's act for him and brother Harry

A NOTE ABOUT RELEVANT ADVERTISING: We collect information about the content (including ads) you use across this site and use it to make both advertising and content more relevant to you on our network and other sites.

value.name: Royal Family ‘can’t trust’ Prince Harry and Meghan Markle
value.description: Royal commentator and biographer Angela Levin warns the Royal Family “can’t trust” Meghan Markle and Prince Harry. The royal commentator was asked what it would take for Prince Harry to return to the Royal fold. “I fear if they do come back as Harry is alleged to want – Meghan does not,” she told Sky News host James Macpherson.

value.name: Could the royals get any more rotten?
value.description: 2023 has left the arrogance of Charles and the ridiculousness of the Sussexes brutally exposed. 2023 – the year of King Charles’s coronation and Prince Harry’s Spare – was a weird year for a republican like me. Though I nurse a profound and lifelong loathing for Charles, I found myself repeatedly taking his side against Harry and Meghan of Montecito. Add to this my weakness for Diana-faced Prince William (even when he is manhandling man-necklaces) and his well-groomed, well-meaning wife (great-great-granddaughter of a miner, daughter of a trolly dolly), and my attitude towards the British monarchy became something of a hot mess.

value.description: The Duchess of Sussex is said to have questions about why she and Prince Harry have been subjected to different rules to other members of the Royal Family, according to an expert.

value.name: How U.S. Really Views Meghan Markle's Royal Race Allegation
value.description: Meghan is 42 while the median age for U.S. women giving birth is 30, NBC News reported in 2022. In other words, those above this age or old enough to be grandparents appeared to be most critical of the royal race saga while those most likely to be expecting themselves were the least.

value.name: Nostradamus Predictions For 2024: A Naval Battle And Crisis In The Royal Family
value.description: The French seer is said to have predicted that a new Pope will soon replace Pope Francis. The morbid prediction says that he might pass away in 2024. "Through the death of a very old Pontiff, A Roman of good age will be elected, Of him it will be said that he weakens his see, But long will he sit and in biting activity."

value.name: Meghan Markle's former New Year's resolution is basically proof she manifested her royal romance
value.description: Meghan went on to reveal a piece of advice her former co-star Gina Torres had given her too. "She stopped me, 'Meg, I will just say one thing. Make sure you leave room for magic'," Meghan recalled, adding: "And that is my point. My New Year’s resolution is to leave room for magic."

value.name: Big fat quiz of the year with 20 questions from Barbie to Prince Harry
value.description: Either way, we’ve put together a big fat quiz of 2023. It aims to test your knowledge of the year that was. In the quiz, you’ll find 20 questions which will test your knowledge of general current affairs, entertainment, sport and other topics. There will also be some questions specifically focused on Yorkshire.

value.name: Queen Margrethe's reign in pictures
value.description: Europe's current longest-serving monarch announced in a New Year's Eve speech that she will step down on 14 January - exactly 52 years to the day of her ascension to the throne in 1972.

value.name: ‘The Crown’ May Have Broken Up Dominic West and Prince Harry’s Friendship
value.description: Apparently, however, that lack of ill will has faded somewhat. Dominic West, the actor who plays Harry’s father Prince Charles on The Crown, has revealed that although he was previously acquaintances with Harry, the two have since lost touch, allegedly due to remarks West publicly made about his rendition of the role.
